targets.expr: sum(increase(http_requests_total{namespace="$namespace", method="GET", status_code="200", source_cluster="$source_cluster", datacenter="$datacenter",  url="/v1/collection/id/items"}[1m])) by (id)
sum(increase(http_requests_total{namespace="$namespace", method="GET", status_code=~"5..",  source_cluster="$source_cluster", datacenter="$datacenter", url="/v1/collection/id/items"}[1m])) by (id)
sum(increase(http_requests_total{namespace="$namespace", method="GET", status_code=~"4..", source_cluster="$source_cluster", datacenter="$datacenter",  url="/v1/collection/id/items"}[1m])) by (id)
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(http_requests_time_bucket{namespace="$namespace", source_cluster="$source_cluster", datacenter="$datacenter",  url="/v1/collection/id/items"}[1m])) by (le, id))
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(http_requests_time_bucket{namespace="$namespace", source_cluster="$source_cluster", datacenter="$datacenter",  url="/v1/collection/id/items"}[1m])) by (le, id))

panels.title: Local cache add new key time

alert.message: Persona Collections max CPU usage is above 60%. Please check https://grafana.hotstar.com/d/6Dp2rDCZz/personalisation-collections?tab=alert&editPanel=99&orgId=1&from=now-15m&to=now&var-namespace=personalisation&var-datasource=prometheus&var-service=persona-collections
alert.name: CPU alert

targets.expr: max(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", source_cluster="$source_cluster", datacenter="$datacenter",  pod=~".*persona-collection.*"}[1m])) / avg(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{namespace="$namespace", source_cluster="$source_cluster", datacenter="$datacenter",  pod=~".*persona-collection.*"})

max(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="personalisation", source_cluster="$source_cluster", datacenter="$datacenter",  pod=~".*persona-collection.*"}[1m])) / avg(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{namespace="personalisation", source_cluster="$source_cluster", datacenter="$datacenter",  pod=~".*persona-collection.*"})

sum(label_replace(namespace_pod_name_container_name:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate{namespace="$namespace", source_cluster="$source_cluster", datacenter="$datacenter",  pod_name=~"$service.*"}, "container", "$1", "container_name", "(.*)")) by (container) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{namespace="$namespace", source_cluster="$source_cluster", datacenter="$datacenter",  pod=~"$service.*"}) by (container)

sum(label_replace(namespace_pod_name_container_name:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate{namespace="$namespace", source_cluster="$source_cluster", datacenter="$datacenter",  pod_name=~"$service.*"}, "container", "$1", "container_name", "(.*)")) by (container) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_cpu_cores{namespace="$namespace", source_cluster="$source_cluster", datacenter="$datacenter",  pod=~"$service.*"}) by (container)

alert.message: Persona Collections pod max memory usage is above 90%.
alert.name: Memory usage alert

targets.expr: sum(container_memory_rss{namespace="$namespace", source_cluster="$source_cluster", datacenter="$datacenter", container =~ ".*main.*"}) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{namespace="$namespace",  source_cluster="$source_cluster", datacenter="$datacenter", container =~ ".*main.*"}) by (pod)

max(sum(container_memory_rss{namespace="personalisation", source_cluster="$source_cluster", datacenter="$datacenter", container =~ ".*main.*"}) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{namespace="personalisation",  source_cluster="$source_cluster", datacenter="$datacenter", container =~ ".*main.*"}) by (pod))

avg(sum(container_memory_rss{namespace="personalisation", source_cluster="$source_cluster", datacenter="$datacenter", container =~ ".*main.*"}) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{namespace="personalisation",  source_cluster="$source_cluster", datacenter="$datacenter", container =~ ".*main.*"}) by (pod))

sum(label_replace(container_memory_usage_bytes{namespace="$namespace", pod_name=~"$service.*", source_cluster="$source_cluster", datacenter="$datacenter",  container_name!="POD", container_name!=""}, "container", "$1", "container_name", "(.*)")) by (container)

sum(label_replace(container_memory_usage_bytes{namespace="$namespace", source_cluster="$source_cluster", datacenter="$datacenter",  pod_name=~"$service.*"}, "container", "$1", "container_name", "(.*)")) by (container) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{namespace="$namespace",  source_cluster="$source_cluster", datacenter="$datacenter", pod=~"$service.*"}) by (container)

sum(label_replace(container_memory_usage_bytes{namespace="$namespace", source_cluster="$source_cluster", datacenter="$datacenter",  pod_name=~"$service.*", container_name!=""}, "container", "$1", "container_name", "(.*)")) by (container) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_memory_bytes{namespace="$namespace", source_cluster="$source_cluster", datacenter="$datacenter",  pod=~"$service.*"}) by (container)

sum(label_replace(container_memory_rss{namespace="$namespace", source_cluster="$source_cluster", datacenter="$datacenter",  pod_name=~"$service.*", container_name != "", container_name != "POD"}, "container", "$1", "container_name", "(.*)")) by (container)

sum(label_replace(container_memory_swap{namespace="$namespace", source_cluster="$source_cluster", datacenter="$datacenter",  pod_name=~"$service.*", container_name != "", container_name != "POD"}, "container", "$1", "container_name", "(.*)")) by (container)
